sub_title: Senior Art Director with a passion and drive for design and layout
summary:
“Always see the bigger picture with every design and layout, you will know when something feels right” - Saskia Duckworth

I love throwing myself into new things that take me out of my comfort zone, after being the most un-athletic person on the planet, I have now run over 15 half marathons, swam in 2 long distance races and have now taken on the challenge of learning to ride a bike…. again.

With 15 years experience in the design industry, I am constantly evolving with new trends, while learning how to adapt when your gut tells you something just isn’t working.

I've had the honour of working for some incredibly talented creative leaders as a senior Art Director in many international agencies, the rush of a new brief still sends a shiver of excitement down my spine and a quick brainstorm is always a good time. It still amazes me where great ideas come from where inspiration can be found.

I have definitely learnt the most from running my own business, nurturing client relationships and working with small and medium sized business’s to develop a creative voice in the market, happy clients give me a massive amount of pride. I have the ability to take on any sized project and develop it from brief to completion efficiently across all platforms, no matter how big or small! 

I have just taken on the adventure of a lifetime in moving to Amsterdam and starting over.  I’m excited to have the opportunity to use my knowledge and learn from the people who call this creative oasis home.

Contact me on saskiaduckworth@gmail.com or have a look at some of the exciting projects i have worked on at saskiaduckworth.com

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Arts Graphic Design, Web Design and Animation

profile_positions.description: Im so excited to be searching for a job in Amsterdam, with the opportunity to be part of this incredibly diverse and cutting edge hub in design and technology! With my experience I am looking forward to joining a team to creatively push briefs forward and evolve what is needed to the next level.
profile_positions.title: Just Arrived! Available for a new opportunity

profile_positions.description:
Co Owner of a multimedia digital design agency 8 Bit Digital
- Co-ordinated design projects from brief to completion spanning online and print work
- Maintained client relationships and acquired new clients
- Consistently met tight deadlines and while turning out day to day creative needed for social media campaigns, sales presentations, packaging, website, print, and online animated advertising for multiple clients 
- Managed all operational, strategic, financial and administrative business functions
profile_positions.title: Owner of Company

profile_positions.description:
As a freelance Senior Art Director i worked at the following agencies to create work based on specific corporate identities while developing concepts for campaigns.

STUDIO 4332 - Above the line print creative 
- Brands: Grolsch, BUCO (large scale building material supplier), Imperial (Insurance provider)

1886FCB (Now Mcann1886) - Above the line print creative - 
Brands: Vodacom (Telecommunications), Nivea (Skin Care), Old Mutual (Insurance), Cell C (Telecommunications), Sasfin (Banking) and Steers(Fast Food)

Native VML - Online animated creative 
- Brands: Nedbank (Banking), Nandos (Fast Food), Liberty (Insurance), Standard Bank (Banking)

Y&R South Africa - Store broadsheets and holiday campaign creative 
- Brands: Pick n Pay (Major Grocery Store)
profile_positions.title: Freelance Senior Art Director

profile_positions.description:
Multimedia Designer for Howber Services which ran various online and land based casinos
- Design and layout for all website promotions, animated banner advertising, emailers and web layout design
- Management for work flow and team allocation
- Communication between marketing department and design department
- All print, and large scale design for land based casino
- TV ad animation and concept
- Casino game graphics for casino acquisition
profile_positions.title: Multimedia Designer
